Tools:
__RELABEL_FROM_FILE__, collapse_dataset, Paste1, samtools_view, vapor, __DUPLICATE_FILE_TO_COLLECTION__, tp_easyjoin_tool, collection_element_identifiers, __APPLY_RULES__, param_value_from_file, __MERGE_COLLECTION__, __FLATTEN__, __HARMONIZELISTS__, ivar_consensus, Filter1, tp_text_file_with_recurring_lines, __FILTER_FAILED_DATASETS__, snipit, __UNZIP_COLLECTION__, tp_cat, fastp, qualimap_bamqc, __FILTER_FROM_FILE__, rbc_mafft, bamtools_split_ref, bwa_mem, bwa mem will fail if no reference for any segment got suggested by vapor, i.e. the reference genome is empty. In that case, we need to skip further analysis of the sample.
__FILTER_FAILED_DATASETS__, This seemingly no-op transformation will remove samples with no remaining segment results (cases where vapor failed for  every segment).
